PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProtectiveDeviceTypeFuseDisconnector
PropertySetDef.Definition: A coherent set of attributes representing the breakeing capacity of a fuse, defined in accordance with IEC 60269. Note - A protective device may be associated with different instances of this pSet providing information related to different basic characteristics.

PropertyDef.Name: FuseDisconnectorType
PropertyDef.Definition:
A list of the available types of fuse disconnector from which that required may be selected where:
EngineProtectionDevice: A fuse whose characteristic is specifically designed for the protection of a motor or generator. FuseSwitchDisconnector: A switch disconnector in which a fuse link or a fuse carrier with fuse link forms the moving contact, HRC: A standard fuse (High Rupturing Capacity) OverloadProtectionDevice: A device that disconnects the supply when the operating conditions in an electrically undamaged circuit causes an overcurrent, SemiconductorFuse: A fuse whose characteristic is specifically designed for the protection of sem-conductor devices. SwitchDisconnectorFuse: A switch disconnector in which one or more poles have a fuse in series in a composite unit.

PropertyDef.Name: VoltageLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: The voltage levels of the protective device for which the data of the instance is valid. More than one value may be selected in the enumeration.

PropertyDef.Name: IC60269
PropertyDef.Definition: The breaking capacity in [A] for fuses in accordance with the IEC 60269 series.

PropertyDef.Name: PowerLoss
PropertyDef.Definition: The power loss in [W] per pole of the MCB when the nominal current is flowing through the MCB.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfPhases
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of phases that the equipment operates on.

PropertyDef.Name: BreakingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: The current that a fuse, circuit breaker, or other electrical apparatus is able to interrupt without being destroyed or causing an electric arc with unacceptable duration.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfPoles
PropertyDef.Definition: The number of live lines that is intended to be handled by the device.

PropertyDef.Name: TransformationRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: The ratio of the actual primary current or voltage to the actual secondary current or voltage.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalFrequency
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal frequency of the supply.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalCurrent
PropertyDef.Definition: A set of nominal currents in [A] for which the data of this instance is valid. At least one value shall be provided. Any value in the set shall not exceed the value of the UltimateRatedCurrent associated with the same breaker unit.

PropertyDef.Name: RatedVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The range of allowed voltage that a device is certified to handle. The upper bound of this value is the maximum.
